name: Skylight Racer
description:
Skylight Racer is a flight based racing game, featuring customizable spaceships. Players must fly through a set of goal rings while avoiding asteroids and other player’s ships, trying to get the fastest completion time.

A small racing game, you can race through three different levels: Flush, Slalom, and The Drop, changing out your ship’s thrusters, engines, and hull in order to get the best performance. Connect with other players in order to race against them! Movement is momentum based, requiring players to account for their previous thrust in order to achieve the quickest routes.
